game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Computer, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Has a PlayerType, a Board, and an array of Ships: Carrier, Battleship, Cruiser, Submarine, or Destroyer
    Author:
    zohair
